content.rendered:
ABOUT Connect
with us Submit a prayer request or testimony, volunteer to help or make a donation CONNECT NOW Interactive
Prayer Do you want to receive prayer online? SUBMIT FORM

Interactive Prayer with Brother Chris

Do you want to receive prayer online? Click the button below to apply.

Complete Form

Live Monthly Online Service

On the first Saturday of every month, join us at 2pm (UK time) – to receive God’s Word, experience God’s power and acknowledge God’s goodness – in our monthly service streaming live from the God’s Heart TV Studio here in North Wales!  We invite you to join the fellowship! Join the family! Join us in faith as we seek God’s heart together!

God's Heart TV on Social Media

Youtube Facebook Tiktok Instagram Telegram Twitter

WhatsApp Daily Encouragement

Receive daily words of encouragement from Brother Chris on WhatsApp!

Sign Up

Keep in Touch - Newsletter Subscription

To lead people towards a greater understanding of God’s heart (Acts 13:22)
Our Mission
To proclaim the Gospel of Jesus Christ and minister prayer in the power of the Holy Spirit (1 Corinthians 2:4-5)
Our Mission
To share God’s love through charity projects (1 John 3:18)
Our Mission
To cultivate a climate of faith where people can see life clearly (2 Kings 6:17)
Our Mission
Previous
Next
